title: We're Proud Of The Steps This Bert Show Member Is Taking For Their Mental Health
description:
Producer Romeo has opened up about his crippling anxiety. He's been struggling for a while, but he finally sought help! His doctor gave him some medication to help. So how does he feel about this? Listen!
